name: Antlered Man 'Surrounded By White Men' Single T Shirt
description:
This is a t-shirt single. Don't know what it is?  READ THIS...

With the Purchase of this t-shirt you will receive a free download of Antlered Man's debut single 'Surrounded By White Men' plus an exclusive B side. Bargain!

This is a limited edition product so ORDER NOW to avoid disappointment.

Warning!
Pre orders are available now but you will not recieve the t-shirt until the release of the single (TBA within the next week, it's pencilled for 21/03/11 at the moment but this is subject to change)
